EcmaScript6 Examples - default parameters

EcmaScript 6 brings a very popular feature in other languages, and which makes a gap until EcmaScript 5. The default parameters makes easy work with functions that parameter can't be informed.

Let's see an example: 

                
                    var sum = function(a = 1, b =2){
                        console.log(a + b);
                    };

                    sum();
                    sum(4,5);

The function receives two parameters which have default values like 1 and 2. If the parameters are not informed the function will use the default values to makes a sum. In the first call without to pass the parameters the result is 3 because the function has used the defaults parameters, and in second call where was informed the values 4 and 5 the result is 9 summing the values.
